verses.text: \w Deliver|strong="H2502"\w* me, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, from the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w*: \w preserve|strong="H5341"\w* me from the \w violent|strong="H2555"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*;\f + \fr 140.1 \ft violent…: Heb. man of violences\f*

Which \w imagine|strong="H2803"\w* \w mischiefs|strong="H7451"\w* in \add their\add* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*; \w continually|strong="H3117"\w* are they gathered \w together|strong="H1481"\w* \add for\add* \w war|strong="H4421"\w*.

They have \w sharpened|strong="H8150"\w* their \w tongues|strong="H3956"\w* like a \w serpent|strong="H5175"\w*; \w adders’|strong="H5919"\w* \w poison|strong="H2534"\w* \add is\add* under their \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.

\w Keep|strong="H8104"\w* me, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, from the \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*; \w preserve|strong="H5341"\w* me from the \w violent|strong="H2555"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*; who have \w purposed|strong="H2803"\w* to \w overthrow|strong="H1760"\w* my \w goings|strong="H6471"\w*.

The \w proud|strong="H1343"\w* have \w hid|strong="H2934"\w* a \w snare|strong="H6341"\w* for me, and \w cords|strong="H2256"\w*; they have \w spread|strong="H6566"\w* a \w net|strong="H7568"\w* by the \w wayside|strong="H3027"\w*; they have \w set|strong="H7896"\w* \w gins|strong="H4170"\w* for me. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.

I \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, Thou \add art\add* my \w God|strong="H0410"\w*: \w hear|strong="H0238"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of my \w supplications|strong="H8469"\w*, O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

O \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, the \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* of my \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*, thou hast \w covered|strong="H5526"\w* my \w head|strong="H7218"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w battle|strong="H5402"\w*.

\w Grant|strong="H5414"\w* not, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, the \w desires|strong="H3970"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*: \w further|strong="H6329"\w* not his wicked \w device|strong="H2162"\w*; \add lest\add* they \w exalt|strong="H7311"\w* themselves. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.\f + \fr 140.8 \ft lest…: or, let them not be exalted\f*

\add As for\add* the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of those that compass me \w about|strong="H4524"\w*, let the \w mischief|strong="H5999"\w* of their own \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* them.

Let burning \w coals|strong="H1513"\w* \w fall|strong="H4131"\w* upon them: let them be \w cast|strong="H5307"\w* into the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*; into deep \w pits|strong="H4113"\w*, that they rise not up \w again|strong="H6965"\w*.

Let not an evil \w speaker|strong="H0376"\w* be \w established|strong="H3559"\w* in the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* shall \w hunt|strong="H6679"\w* the \w violent|strong="H2555"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* to \w overthrow|strong="H4073"\w* \add him\add*.\f + \fr 140.11 \ft an…: or, an evil speaker (Heb. a man of tongue), a wicked man of violence, be established in the earth: let him be hunted to his overthrow\f*

I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will \w maintain|strong="H6213"\w* the \w cause|strong="H1779"\w* of the \w afflicted|strong="H6041"\w*, \add and\add* the \w right|strong="H4941"\w* of the \w poor|strong="H0034"\w*.

Surely the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* shall give \w thanks|strong="H3034"\w* unto thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*: the \w upright|strong="H3477"\w* shall \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in thy \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*.
